body_html:
Keras just landed in contrib and will undergo some internal refactoring for a bit. The plan is to provide simple ways to:

  • use Keras inside a model_fn (already the case, Keras layers work fine inside Estimators)
  • use a compiled Keras Model to create an Estimator
  • add the ability for a Keras Model to accept an input_fn for its fit() method.

This will take a while but it's on the roadmap (@fchollet you may correct me on the last bullet).

body:
Keras just landed in contrib and will undergo some internal refactoring for a bit. The plan is to provide simple ways to:

- use Keras inside a model_fn (already the case, Keras layers work fine inside Estimators)
- use a compiled Keras Model to create an Estimator
- add the ability for a Keras Model to accept an input_fn for its fit() method.

This will take a while but it's on the roadmap (@fchollet you may correct me on the last bullet).
